name: example
summary: A short description given to the LLM to uniquely identify the object
description: A description given to the player containing all information he is allowed to know from the start
facts: A list of possible information about the object
It can be hard coded text
Or open questions for the LLM

interactions.summary: A short description of the interaction

children: This list contains all children objects of an object
It can be the name of another object defined somewhere as JSON
